Scene.T: Hello! You can go to the next message with A.
I can also skip it automatically.[wait=1.5][skip]
[noskip]And you can't skip this text! Go on! Try it![wait=2] See?[wait=0.5] Told ya.
I can talk [wait=1][speed=0]really fast [wait=1][speed=0.5]or really slow.
I can also add...[wait=2]uh...[wait=2]Oh![wait=0.5] Right![wait=0.5] Pauses!
